item.title: Is Canada CANCELLING Christmas!?! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ November 29, 2023
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew are joined by Pastor Alex Kloosterman to talk about how to build culture while fighting in the current culture war, all to the glory of God.

[Segment 1] - Building & Fighting POLITICALLY:
"Judge Ignores Evidence of Lockdown Harms When Justifying Charter Violations" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/judge-ignores-evidence-of-lockdown-harms-when-justifying-charter-violations;
"Bardosh Report (Redacted)" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Bardosh-Report-REDACTEDupdated.pdf?mc_eid=0d5021d036;
"Liberals' Legacy Media Bailout Funds" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/11/22/liberals-legacy-media-bailout-funds;
"Trudeau Gov't Fall Economic Statement Includes Massive Payouts to Legacy Media Ahead of Election" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeau-govt-fall-economic-statement-includes-massive-payouts-to-legacy-media-ahead-of-election;
"Trudeau Signs Partnership with EU to Promote Digital IDs, Counter Disinformation" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeau-signs-partnership-with-eu-to-promote-digital-ids-counter-disinformation;
"Canada-European Union Digital Partnership" | ISED - Canada: https://ised-isde.canada.ca/site/ised/en/canada-european-union-digital-partnership;

[Segment 2] - Building & Fighting CULTURALLY:
"Federal Commission Declares Christmas Holiday Is Religious Intolerance" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/opinion/federal-commission-declares-christmas-holiday-is-religious-intolerance;
"Petition Launched in Canada to Ban Tucker Carlson from Entering the Country" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/petition-launched-in-canada-to-ban-tucker-carlson-from-entering-the-country?utm_content=;
"Ontario Teacher Claims Parents Who Oppose Teaching of Marxism, Trans Rights Are 'Triggered Snowflakes'" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/ontario-teacher-claims-parents-who-oppose-teaching-of-marxism-trans-rights-are-triggered-snowflakes?utm_content=

[Segment 3] - Why, What, & How to Build & Fight ft. Pastor Alex Kloosterman:
HillCity Baptist Church: https://www.hillcitybaptist.com/;
Dominion Press: https://www.dominionpress.ca/;
Resistance Coffee: https://resistancecoffee.com/;

Don't Miss the "A Call  to Build Conference" - February 8 - 10: https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/a-call-to-build-conference-registration-728345169007?aff=oddtdtcreator;

item.title: The DEVASTATING INCOMPETENCE of Canada's Ruling Elite [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ November 23, 2023
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew swim the swamp of current Canadian news to bring to light the insane evil of our current cultural and political moment. What Shall We Do? Let's build a culture of virtuous liberty!

[Segment 1] - CAN YOU BELIEVE IT!?! Another COVID Rapid Fire:
"Ontario Lifts Mask Mandates in Long-Term Care Homes" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/ontario-mask-mandates-long-term-care;
Toronto Sick Kids Video via Viva Frei | Twitter: https://twitter.com/thevivafrei/status/1725529151199650085;
"Opinion: The Disastrous Toll of the Pandemic on School Learning" | The New York Times: https://www.nytimes.com/2023/11/18/opinion/pandemic-school-learning-loss.html;
"The Swedish Left Must Face Its Covid Failures" | Jacobin: https://jacobin.com/2023/11/swedish-left-covid-pandemic-neoliberal-failures-public-health;
"BC Healthcare Workers Prevented from Returning to Work Despite Understaffing" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/bc-healthcare-workers-prevented-from-returning-to-work-despite-understaffing;
"More Than Half of Vaccinated People Feel..." | Peter McCullough, MD: https://petermcculloughmd.substack.com/p/more-than-half-of-vaccinated-feel;

[Segment 2] - The Continuing Insanity of Our Insane Medical Industry:
"Canadian Psychologists Debate Allowing Assisted Suicide for Mentally Ill Patients as Deadline Approaches" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canadian-psychologists-debate-allowing-assisted-suicide-for-mentally-ill-patients-as-deadline-approaches?utm_content=;
"Children's Hospital Foundation Funds Gender Transition" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/11/16/childrens-hospital-foundation-gender-transition;

[Segment 3] - Our Corrupt, Lazy, Stupid, Marxist Ruling Class:
"Trudeau Devotes a Quarter of His Time to Personal Days" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/trudeau-devotes-a-quarter-of-his-time-to-personal-days-data;
"Trudeau's Environment Minister Proclaims Himself Proud Socialist Before House of Commons" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeaus-environment-minister-proclaims-himself-proud-socialist-before-house-of-commons;
"Heritage Minister Wants Online Streaming Act Quickly Implemented" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/heritage-minister-wants-online-streaming-act-quickly-implemented/50210.

item.title: Our DISGRACEFUL Prime-Troll HATES Canadians [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ November 16, 2023
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew take a look at our shameful Prime Minister's latest troll as a spokesperson for Big Pharma, his consistent disdain for Canadians, and all sorts of news from at home and abroad.

[Segment 1] - Prime-Troll Shows His HATRED for Canadians:
Vaccine Causes Adults Video by Justin Trudeau | Twitter: https://twitter.com/JustinTrudeau/status/1722349593537474638;
"World News" | The Epoch Times: https://m.theepochtimes.com/world/?p=5524958;
"Colorado Research Facility Will Import Bats from Across the Globe and Inject Them with Various Diseases, Funded by Fauci’s NIH" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/colorado-research-facility-will-import-bats-from-across-the-globe-and-inject-them-w-various-diseases-funded-by-faucis-nih;
"CDC Reports Record High Childhood Vaccine Refusals" | The Gateway Pundit: https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2023/11/cdc-reports-record-high-childhood-vaccine-refusals;

[Segment 2] - News from at Home:
"Canadian Nurse Forced to Testify Under Cross-Examination That Women Don't Have Penises" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canadian-nurse-forced-to-testify-under-cross-examination-that-women-dont-have-penises?utm_content=;
"CBC Blames Budget Cut, Meta, Google" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2023/11/09/cbc-blames-budget-cut-meta-google;

[Segment 3] - News from Abroad:
"Transsexuals Can Be Baptized Catholic, Serve as Godparents, Vatican Says" | Reuters: https://www.reuters.com/world/transsexuals-can-be-baptized-catholic-serve-godparents-vatican-says-2023-11-08;
"Why I'm Not Having Children" | CNN: https://www.cnn.com/2023/11/11/opinions/not-having-children-lee
